name: Tatl
description:
Description

In this short little adventure game you help a faerie named Tatl find her way home. 

The game was created in 9 days for the 25th Godot Wild Jam. Unless otherwise noted all assets and code were created by me during the jam. The project is also available on Github under the MIT license.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Mouse for looking around
  • Left mouse button: special ability
  • Right mouse button: change form
Third party assets

Gate sound: from 'LittleRobotSoundFactory' on freesound.org
Crow sound: Sonniss GDC 2018 Audio bundle
Thunder sound: from 'bajko' on freesound.org
Music: OtherWorlds by FXhome
Grass textures: Kenny's foliage pack
Camera shake code: from u/arrnz on Reddit
Fonts: JosefinSans, Bebas
